title: Bali Adventure
summary: Explore the beauty of Bali with this adventurous 7-day trip. You'll be exploring the islands of Nusa Dua and Uluwatu, visiting the famous Uluwatu Temple, watching the sunset at Kuta Beach, and swimming in the crystal-clear waters of Nusa Lembongan. You'll also get to experience the local culture and cuisine, with a cooking class and a visit to a traditional Balinese village.

title: Mount Bromo Sunrise Tour
summary: Witness the majestic sunrise at Mount Bromo. This 1-day tour will take you to one of the most beautiful national parks in Indonesia. You'll be picked up from your hotel at 12am and driven to Mount Bromo, where you'll watch the sunrise from the highest point of the mountain. You'll then ride a horse to the crater of Mount Bromo and explore the surrounding area. After a long day of adventure, you'll be driven back to your hotel, arriving around 8am.
termsAndConditions: Cancellation allowed up to 48 hours before.

title: Komodo Island Exploration
summary: Discover the wonders of Komodo Island and its dragons. This 3-day tour will take you on an unforgettable adventure to the heart of the Indonesian archipelago. You'll be exploring the beautiful beaches, coral reefs, and lush forests of Komodo National Park, and getting up close and personal with the majestic Komodo dragons. You'll also have the chance to snorkel in the crystal-clear waters of the Flores Sea, and enjoy the stunning sunsets of the island. This tour is perfect for nature lovers, adventure seekers, and anyone looking for a unique and unforgettable experience.

title: Yogyakarta Cultural Trip
summary: Immerse yourself in the rich culture of Yogyakarta. This 2-day trip will take you to the magnificent Borobudur Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most impressive architectural wonders in Southeast Asia. You'll also explore the vibrant streets of Yogyakarta, visit the Sultan's Palace, and indulge in delicious local cuisine. This trip is perfect for those who want to experience the authentic culture of Indonesia.
termsAndConditions: Full refund up to 5 days before the trip.

title: Raja Ampat Diving Expedition
summary: Dive into the pristine waters of Raja Ampat, exploring the vibrant coral reefs and diverse marine life. This 5-day diving expedition will take you to some of the most breathtaking underwater locations in the world. You'll have the opportunity to dive with manta rays, sea turtles, and a myriad of colorful fish. Whether you're a seasoned diver or a beginner, this expedition offers something for everyone. Enjoy the serene beauty of the ocean and the stunning landscapes of Raja Ampat, with experienced guides ensuring a safe and unforgettable adventure.
